price: On zna šta su uradili i šta će uraditi. – A Allahu se sve vraća.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā bayna aydīhim wamā khalfahum wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
